docs.text: pyGeckoCrypto This package is a wrapper of the CoinGecko API which can be used to pull current and historical prices of Crypto Currencies. PYPI link for this package - pyGeckoCrypto Getting Started Installation Installation Steps First let's do an easy pip installation of the library by running the following command - pip install pyGeckoCrypto Quickstart # Importing the Package from pyGeckoCrypto import get_current_price , get_hist_price_range # Sample Data coinID = "bitcoin" # Refer Coin List currency = "usd" # Refer Currency List startdate = "1625097600" # Unix Timestamp enddate = "1627775999" # Unix Timestamp # Getting Current Price get_current_price ( coinID , currency ) # Getting Historical Price for a period get_hist_price_range ( coinID , currency , startdate , enddate ) Refer CoinGecko API doc to find more information of the required parameters for the above functions.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: This package is a wrapper of the CoinGecko API which can be used to pull current and historical prices of Crypto Currencies. PYPI link for this package - pyGeckoCrypto
docs.title: pyGeckoCrypto

docs.text: Installation Steps First let's do an easy pip installation of the library by running the following command - pip install pyGeckoCrypto
docs.title: Installation

docs.text: # Importing the Package from pyGeckoCrypto import get_current_price , get_hist_price_range # Sample Data coinID = "bitcoin" # Refer Coin List currency = "usd" # Refer Currency List startdate = "1625097600" # Unix Timestamp enddate = "1627775999" # Unix Timestamp # Getting Current Price get_current_price ( coinID , currency ) # Getting Historical Price for a period get_hist_price_range ( coinID , currency , startdate , enddate ) Refer CoinGecko API doc to find more information of the required parameters for the above functions.
docs.title: Quickstart

docs.text: API Reference Getting Current Price Example Short Example from pyGeckoCrypto import get_current_price coinID = "bitcoin" currency = "usd" get_current_price ( coinID , currency ) Args Type Description coinID str input coin name as per API id as a string currency str input currency as a string Returns Type Description Response float returns price of the coin Getting Historical Price for a period Example Short Example from pyGeckoCrypto import get_hist_price_range coinID = "bitcoin" currency = "usd" startdate = "1625097600" enddate = "1627775999" get_hist_price_range ( coinID , currency , startdate , enddate ) Args Type Description coinID str input coin name as per API id as a string currency str input currency as a string startdate str input start date in UNIX Time as a string enddate str input start date in UNIX Time as a string Returns Type Description Response dict returns historical price for the period
docs.title: API Reference

docs.text: from pyGeckoCrypto import get_current_price coinID = "bitcoin" currency = "usd" get_current_price ( coinID , currency ) Args Type Description coinID str input coin name as per API id as a string currency str input currency as a string Returns Type Description Response float returns price of the coin
docs.title: Short Example
Getting Historical Price for a period

docs.text: from pyGeckoCrypto import get_hist_price_range coinID = "bitcoin" currency = "usd" startdate = "1625097600" enddate = "1627775999" get_hist_price_range ( coinID , currency , startdate , enddate ) Args Type Description coinID str input coin name as per API id as a string currency str input currency as a string startdate str input start date in UNIX Time as a string enddate str input start date in UNIX Time as a string Returns Type Description Response dict returns historical price for the period
